questions.text: Original: 'The weather is too cold for swimming.'
options: The weather is perfect for swimming.
It's too warm to go swimming.
The weather is so cold that we can't swim.
We should swim because it's cold.
questions.explanation: התשובה הנכונה היא משפט 3 כי 'too cold for' שקול ל-'so cold that we can't'. שניהם מבטאים שהקור מונע שחייה.

questions.text: Original: 'She always arrives early to work.'
options: She never comes to work on time.
She is always late for work.
She consistently gets to work before the scheduled time.
She sometimes arrives early to work.
questions.explanation: תשובה 3 נכונה כי 'consistently gets to work before the scheduled time' זהה במשמעות ל-'always arrives early to work'.

questions.text: Original: 'The book was too difficult for me to understand.'
options: I found the book easy to read.
The book was so hard that I couldn't understand it.
I understood the book perfectly.
The book was simple enough for me.
questions.explanation: תשובה 2 נכונה כי 'too difficult for me to understand' זהה ל-'so hard that I couldn't understand it'.

questions.text: Original: 'My brother is taller than me.'
options: I am shorter than my brother.
My brother and I are the same height.
I am taller than my brother.
My brother is very short.
questions.explanation: תשובה 1 נכונה כי אם האח גבוה יותר ממני, אז אני נמוך יותר מהאח. זו אותה עובדה מזווית אחרת.

questions.text: Original: 'It's necessary to study for the exam.'
options: You don't need to study for the exam.
Studying for the exam is optional.
You must study for the exam.
The exam doesn't require preparation.
questions.explanation: תשובה 3 נכונה כי 'it's necessary to' שקול ל-'you must'. שניהם מבטאים חובה או הכרח.

options: The movie was exciting and interesting.
The movie was not interesting.
The movie was fantastic.
Everyone loved the movie.
questions.explanation: תשובה 2 נכונה כי 'boring' זהה במשמעות ל-'not interesting'. שניהם מתארים משהו שלא מעניין.

options: I like coffee more than tea.
I like tea and coffee equally.
I like tea better than coffee.
I don't like tea or coffee.
questions.explanation: תשובה 3 נכונה כי 'prefer tea to coffee' זהה ל-'like tea better than coffee'. שניהם מבטאים העדפה של תה על פני קפה.

options: The store closes at 9 AM.
The store starts operating at 9 AM.
The store is closed at 9 AM.
The store opens at 9 PM.
questions.explanation: תשובה 2 נכונה כי 'opens at 9 AM' זהה ל-'starts operating at 9 AM'. שניהם מתארים את זמן תחילת הפעילות.

questions.text: Original: 'He is unable to come to the party.'
options: He can come to the party.
He will definitely attend the party.
He cannot come to the party.
He is excited about the party.
questions.explanation: תשובה 3 נכונה כי 'unable to' זהה במשמעות ל-'cannot'. שניהם מבטאים חוסר יכולת או אי-אפשרות.

questions.text: Original: 'The test was easy for most students.'
options: Most students found the test difficult.
No students could pass the test.
Most students found the test simple.
All students failed the test.
questions.explanation: תשובה 3 נכונה כי 'easy for most students' זהה ל-'most students found the test simple'. 'Easy' ו-'simple' נרדפים.
